timeline.bodyText: nit: define "fkTopic" and "pkTopic" as class private fields?
timeline.author: guozhangwang

replies.bodyText:
I could... but I'd rather not, if that's ok. These strings are only dummy values, and they appear only once in the test, so there's no safety/consistency savings by declaring a field. There's no reason all the tests need the same strings here, so a field actually creates indirection and coupling where it doesn't provide any value. And the name of the variable would be about as long as the string itself.
I get the impression this won't bother you either way, but it seemed rude not to respond, if I wasn't going to take the suggestion.
replies.author: vvcephei
